mapper.select: Select g.*, b.chlgerCnt From (Select rownum rn, a.* From (select count(*) chlgerCnt, p.chg_id From chg_pick p join challenge c on p.chg_id = c.chg_id Group by p.chg_id ORDER BY chlgerCnt desc)a) b join challenge g on b.chg_id = g.chg_id Where b.rn BETWEEN 1 and 5 ORDER by b.rn

Select c.*, user1.nick From Challenge c JOIN user1 On c.user_num = user1.user_num Where (c.title like '%' || #{srch_word} || '%' Or c.chg_conts like '%' || #{srch_word} || '%') Order By c.reg_date DESC
Select * From comm Where lg =200 and md != 999
mapper.insert: Insert Into comm Values(200, (Select MAX(md)+1 From comm Where lg =200 and md != 999), #{ctn})
mapper.delete: Delete comm Where lg = 200 And ctn = #{ctn}
mapper.select: Select b.*, c.* From ( Select Count(*) chlgerCnt, a.chg_id From (Select * From challenge Where user_num = #{user_num}) a left JOIN challenger g on a.chg_id = g.chg_id GROUP BY a.chg_id) b join challenge c on b.chg_id = c.chg_id Order By c.reg_date DESC
